!Apprentice Atra: This land belongs to Eva, and as followers of Eva, we each have an obligation to uphold her beliefs and tenets. Those idiotic dwarves from the Helvetica Development Base know nothing about the delicate balance of nature; that is why we are here. We are the crusaders of nature, if you will. We fight to preserve that which nature has given to us.
